scripts.init:dve:core: cd ./divinevoxel/core ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinevoxel -w ./divinevoxel/core/dist

scripts.init:dve:all: npm run init:dve:core ; npm run init:dve:iwg ; npm run init:dve:ecs ; npm run init:dve:react

scripts.init:ds:threads: cd ./divinestar/threads ; npm run build ; cd ../../ ; npm init -y --scope @divinestar -w ./divinestar/threads/dist
